I'm 36 and from Trinidad. Single, never married, no kids. I enjoy the simple pleasures — cooking a good meal, heading out to fish, and spending time in nature. I’ve got a love for wine, good conversation, and hands-on work — I work in a machine shop and take pride in what I do. Grounded, genuine, and always up for meaningful connections.
I'm jealous of the people who get to see you everyday ❤️ Good morning...!

Sorry for the late reply, was trying to not be on the phone too much on the weekend. Thanks for the kind introduction. I like when men are conscious about being in tune with nature and healthy nutrition and habits.
When God wants to bliss a man, he gives him a quality woman❤️
How are you, my dear?

Good morning, under skies of gray, A soft rain whispers to greet the day. Each droplet dances, a rhythmic beat, A symphony played on the city street. The clouds embrace the world so tight, A misty veil, a calming sight. The earth drinks deep, a welcome treat, As puddles gather around our feet. Let the rain cleanse, let it renew, Washing the old, making way for the new. In every drop, a quiet refrain— Beauty blooms, even in the rain.
Good morning Ganesh. Thanks for the sweet poem hehe. How are you?

She walks in beauty, like the night Of cloudless climes and starry skies; And all that’s best of dark and bright Meet in her aspect and her eyes: Thus mellowed to that tender light Which heaven to gaudy day denies. One shade the more, one ray the less, Had half impaired the nameless grace Which waves in every raven tress, Or softly lightens o'er her face; Where thoughts serenely sweet express, How pure, how dear their dwelling-place. And on that cheek, and o'er that brow, So soft, so calm, yet eloquent, The smiles that win, the tints that glow, But tell of days in goodness spent, A mind at peace with all below, A heart whose love is innocent!
dennyeligon and trinidad_is_a_real_place
Clip

To You Your smile is like the morning sun, A light so warm, a day begun. Your laughter dances, pure and free, A melody that stays with me. Your kindness shines in all you do, A heart so bright, a soul so true. Each word, each glance, each gentle touch, Brings joy to life, a warmth so much. In every star, in every breeze, I see a beauty that’s at ease. For in this world, there’s none like you, A wonder rare, a dream come true.
Your poems always bring such warmth Ganesh. That last one about the smile and morning sun was really beautiful. How's your week going so far?

The sunset glows, but not like you, A living dream in evening’s hue. If I were close, I’d softly say, You outshine even the end of day.
That sunset poem was gorgeous ❤️ You really have a way with words. What inspired you to write that one?
You’re too kind ❤️ Honestly, I think it wasn’t just the sunset. Maybe thinking of you beautiful helped bring the words to life 😉
Good morning, beautiful I hope your day is as stunning as that smile... and just a little wild like I imagine you can be 😉 Now go out there and steal hearts (but save mine for later).
That's so sweet of you to say ❤️ Your way with words always brightens my day. What's inspiring you to write such lovely poems lately?
Honestly, it's people like you who inspire me. When someone appreciates what I write, it gives me even more reason to keep creating from the heart.
Good morning, gorgeous 🌞 Woke up thinking of that smile brighter than the sun, softer than the breeze. If mornings had a muse, it would be you. 💛
Your morning messages are like sunshine in my pocket 😊 How do you come up with such beautiful imagery so early?

quoted_text: Your morning messages are like sunshine in my pocket 😊 How do you come u…
message: With an inspiration like you, anything is possible...

That’s such a beautiful thing to say, Ramnarine… thank you ❤️ You always put so much heart into your words, it means a lot to me. I’ve been pouring my own heart into creating lately too! 🥰 moments, visuals, reflections that I sometimes don’t post here. That’s why I started a little Patreon, a more personal space where I can share the real side of my creative world. It helps me stay independent, keep building my social media presence and continue showing up with depth, not just surface. If you’d like to be part of that space or support what I’m building, I’d truly love to have you there since I feel you've already become a part of my little world❤️😘 Here’s the link: patreon.com/Kailas_World
